column4: says not found.. its a fresh install... i'm trying sudo apt-get update
hey folks
should i be running 64 bit version of ubuntu?
no
if you don't know why you need 64-bit ubuntu, you don't need it
for extra fast performance?
just becuase the numbers are higher, doesn't mean it'll perform faster
the main benefit is if you have a lot of ram
like 4GB or over
i just have 2gb
which what video card?
nvidia 7950 gtotc
gtotc?
not too sure on the last part... but its definitely 7950
try using nvidia-settings
i did but then it didnt detect my second monitor
should i try resatrig
are you using the nvidia driver?
yes the fresh one downloaded from their site
nfs is read/write
so i can sync a file to my laptop, disconnect from network, then hook back up to the network and changes should be synced automatically?
you cannot use nfs if you are disconnected from the server
it's a simple read/write network filesystem
ah ok
